#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#define ull long long int
#define gc getchar_unlocked
 
using namespace std;
int d_n(ull x[10],int s);
ull read_int() {
	char c = gc();
  	int sign = 1;
  	while((c<'0' || c>'9') && c!='-') c = gc();
  	if(c=='-') {
		sign = -1;
    	c = gc();
	}
  	ull ret = 0;
  	while(c>='0' && c<='9' ) {
    	ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
    	c = gc();
  	}
  	return ret*sign;
}
int main()
{
	int s_x,s_y,i,t;
	ull a,b,sum;
	ull x[10],y[10];
	
	t = read_int();
	for (int j = 0; j < t; j++) {
		a = read_int();
		b = read_int();
		i = 0;
		s_x = i;
		while (a%10 != 0) {
			x[i] = a;
			i++;
			s_x = i;
			a++;
		}
	
		i = 0;
		s_y = i;
		while (b%10 != 0 || i == 0) {
			b++;
			if (b%10 == 0)
				break;
			y[i] = b;
			i++;
			s_y = i;
		}
		sum = ((abs(a-b)/10)*45) + d_n(x,s_x) - d_n(y,s_y) ;
		cout << sum << endl;
	}
}
int d_n(ull x[10],int s)
{
	int ans = 0;
	int sum;
	ull temp,a;
	for (int i = 0; i < s; i++) {
		temp = x[i];
		sum = 0;
		while (temp >= 10) {
			a = temp%10;
			if (a%2 == 0)
				sum = sum + (2*a);
			else 
				sum = sum + a;
			temp = temp/10;
		}
		if (temp%2 == 0)
			sum = sum + 2*temp;
		else 
			sum = sum + temp;
		ans = ans + (sum%10);	
	}
	return (ans);
}
